name: Easy no name ball game
description:
Game is very easy, and kinda entertaining, not from just playing it alone, but while doing sth else. I (for example) play while watching youtube vid. 

Player accelerates forward automaticaly. a, d, left arrow, right arrow are for steering right/left. M to change camera view (there are only 2 now).

I will soon add changeable skins in update v0.3

(I know that I didn't upload v0.1, I forgot)

MacOS build will be at v1.0 update (or earlier)

Also apologies to everyone who thought that It would be some SUPER AWESOME GAME based on cover Image
